<Heading as={'h1'} className={'openapi__heading'} children={'List all collections'}></Heading>

<MethodEndpoint method={'get'} path={'/collections'} context={'endpoint'}></MethodEndpoint>

Retrieve a list of all document collections

<ParamsDetails parameters={undefined}></ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema title={'Body'} body={undefined}></RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
    id={undefined}
    label={undefined}
    responses={{
        '200': {
            description: 'Successful operation',
            content: {
                'application/json': {
                    schema: {
                        type: 'array',
                        items: {
                            type: 'object',
                            properties: {
                                id: { type: 'string', description: 'Unique identifier for the collection', example: 'col_12345' },
                                name: { type: 'string', description: 'Name of the collection', example: 'Engineering Documents' },
                                description: {
                                    type: 'string',
                                    description: 'Description of the collection',
                                    example: 'Collection of engineering documents and specifications'
                                },
                                metadata: {
                                    type: 'object',
                                    description: 'Additional metadata for the collection',
                                    example: { department: 'Engineering', owner: 'Jane Smith' }
                                },
                                documentCount: { type: 'integer', description: 'Number of documents in this collection', example: 42 },
                                createdAt: {
                                    type: 'string',
                                    format: 'date-time',
                                    description: 'Timestamp when the collection was created',
                                    example: '2023-01-01T12:00:00Z'
                                },
                                updatedAt: {
                                    type: 'string',
                                    format: 'date-time',
                                    description: 'Timestamp when the collection was last updated',
                                    example: '2023-01-02T14:30:00Z'
                                }
                            },
                            title: 'Collection'
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        },
        '500': {
            description: 'Internal error',
            content: {
                'application/json': {
                    schema: {
                        type: 'object',
                        properties: {
                            code: { type: 'string', description: 'Error code', example: 'invalid_request' },
                            message: { type: 'string', description: 'Error message', example: 'The request was invalid' },
                            details: {
                                type: 'object',
                                description: 'Additional error details',
                                example: { field: 'title', issue: 'Title is required' }
                            }
                        },
                        title: 'Error'
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }}
></StatusCodes>
